summary: This document contains financial statements and transaction details for Jeffrey Epstein's accounts managed by Bear Stearns. It includes information on portfolio holdings, cash flow analysis, and dividends received over a specified period. The document highlights the management of Epstein's investments and financial activities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary account holder for the financial statements provided by Bear Stearns, detailing his portfolio and transactions.

persons.name: Jeanne Brenan
persons.context: Jeanne Brenan is mentioned as the contact person for Epstein's account at Bear Stearns.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is listed as a third-party contact associated with Epstein's financial interests.

persons.name: Ira Zicherman
persons.context: Ira Zicherman is identified as the account executive managing Epstein's account at Bear Stearns.

connections.description: Jeanne Brenan manages Epstein's financial account at Bear Stearns.
Ira Zicherman is the account executive responsible for Epstein's account.
Harry Beller is a third-party contact associated with Epstein's financial interests.

events.title: Monthly Financial Statement
events.description: Bear Stearns issued a monthly financial statement for Jeffrey Epstein's account detailing portfolio holdings and cash flow.

events.title: End of Month Portfolio Review
events.description: The document summarizes the portfolio performance and cash balance for the month ending December 30, 2005.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's portfolio value as of December 30, 2005, was approximately $4.199 million.
The document includes multiple transactions involving purchases of Dreyfus Cash Management shares.
There are no pending buy or sell orders on file for Epstein's account as of the last statement date.
